title: Was John Kennedy Jr. a candidate in the U.S. Senate before his suspicious plane crashed?
subtitle: John Kennedy Jr. wasn't a candidate in the United States Senate race in New York before he died in a plane crash in July 1999.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: John Kennedy Jr. was a contestant in the United States Senate seat from New York before he was killed in a suspicious plane crash in 1999.
